lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They step in and at first it's like, "Whoa."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They grab their friend and try and pull them back down like a balloon and all of a sudden they start going-- (screaming) It's just this massive uncontrolled yeti floating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody come up so they feel at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like early fizzy lifting anxiety and then eventually they start righting themselves and they're going, "Ooh, this is so cool." They start pushing off walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's scratch marks on the walls as they're doing it but you know, it'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we'll also have the mac and cheese from yesterday, as well as the waffles and the pancakes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double amounts and some ale, yeah. Good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We broke him. Yay! It's all I want in life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the episode, "My Dinner With Yeti"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's-- can I ask what the big yeti-- I'll ask all of them, what their names are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the time dinner is done, too, there are amber spectral cats hanging off of all of them doing kitty biscuits on their arms, their shoulders, just nestled in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do you normally sleep? Like, what's an average night for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we have a bunch of large tents and stretched living spaces made of stone and hides."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah." They all look over to Gestaf who goes like, "If you ever find yourselves around or near the Sanctuary, when we're done walking with you," "just say you're a friend of Gestaf's."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you say it with weapons away."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your hospitality is, well, majestic, and I only hope that we can maybe offer the same at some point."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Excited to experience your way of life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A little more rough and tumble, but it gets by."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, we're kind of-- we're new money, you know? We're kind of new to this lifestyle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Veth took a necrotic dagger into his heart three hours ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all quickly pick out their spaces and lay claim to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you finish, Gestaf goes, "I thank you for-- well, on all our behalfs, for both listening to reason in a moment of tension, and for being kinder than most folks who wander through here are, so thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a rough world, but when you can find moments of commonality...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway," "let's pick up our journey tomorrow." "See how far we get before we have to diverge."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one, and it's really the smallest of the yeti, the one that had the notebook, goes, "Really?" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is all in Zemnian, but it is very old Zemnian and it's hard to translate. So-- and he just starts reading it in its Zemnian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you all have a restful evening in the tower unless there's anything else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drowned out by kitty purrs anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the morning, you set out for your-- this would be third? This will be your fourth day of journey, which you do not have to roll on the table because you are being escorted by the yetis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it is an auto clear, non-problematic day, and you guys make your way around the bend of the mountain range on the northern side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the yeti step off, slowly vanishing over the horizon in the direction of the Sanctuary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They might be too far away, but Caleb remembers and says: Remember, only one boba a day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they are. They didn't hear that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's roll one more time for your final day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, because I've been doing great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And despite the wind and the snowfall, you are allowed safe passage through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Cree) One of them has this sort of sound and you recognize it as Cree's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can respond if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (terrified whisper) Are you pooping? No, that's not-- (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was the drama behind it that made it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would really so here for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it, that is what I say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (panting breaths) Molly just talked to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was Cree, too, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Cree talked to you as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, at the same time. What does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or they're just operating on a much weirder and larger level than we've even considered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have an orb near us right now? How do they know we're here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cast See Invisibility again with the sword summoned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance and, roughly about a foot above Jester's head, you see a slightly faint shimmering beacon of arcane--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes, they seem to be locked on you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a plus five to my wisdom, thank you very much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we? I mean it's nighttime, daytime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are heavy valleys at some points, sometimes wide, sometimes very small, but it is a very broken landscape in comparison to where you've been.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we find, like, a way in or down or through? Dagen, have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you precariously follow in Dagen's tracks as he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it does not last the entire length of your See Invisibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just making sure we're not showing them the way in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like we did with Obann?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or like it's just from a-- from a rock somewhere?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone see anything, want to sweep the horizons, do a perception check? Any ledges or embankments or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a natural one, which brings it to 11, but...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but it's still natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's an oddly alien landscape within an alien landscape.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it at all like the Barbed Fields type of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is-- this is the excavation site that you've been seeking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there footprints leading into it? Just like people have already--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to make an investigation check to look, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a three minus one, so that's a two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- any sign of camping, campfires, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would have been your survival roll on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh way higher, that would have been eight with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's enough snow on them where it looks like they've been there for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do see fresher sets of footprints, a number of them that have made their way to that opening probably in the past 24 hours or so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These bodies, do they look like the rough and tumble dangerous type or workers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, a little bit of both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some sort of battle or assault ended their life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see one looks a little more almost merchant in the way their clothing is presented, though they're wearing a heavy cloak over it, but their whole front of their torso is just stained red and they are frozen in a layer of thick ice and snow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any items on these people, magical items, weapons, anything like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll cast Detect Magic, hearing Fjord say that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them don't even have boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like whoever killed them, robbed whatever seemed to be of worth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this opening down into below, is it big? Is it like a little mineshaft? What are we talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, maybe, 12 feet across from side to side and no taller than eight feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any markings? Any signs? Any language, carvings on the wall that looks like it's signifying anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's just nature at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This has been-- You gather because what you do as an investigator, that this cavern has been uncovered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. I mean, it was, the cave itself was natural in its formation but it was uncovered by digging and removal of ice forcefully and that's the most you get out of that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The best I can think of is to send my cat in and see how long it takes for them to kill him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know how far down they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know if they're in there at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They may have been here yesterday and moved on already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any footprints that look like they are leading away from here further north? Like they've been here and then they're gone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: None of the fresher ones look like they've moved away?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meaning there's lot's of old stale ones going in every direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is an ambush. What are we doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five on seven? Could be worse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah but they're five that killed a really strong--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, it snuck up on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go invisible and scout ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a thing that people do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to send a message to Molly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about you say, "Where are you?" or "Clap three times."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sound like he's lying? (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a two, so seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hearing that voice again after so long it still rattles you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You never asked him what his name is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we join him? What if we take him up on his offer and join him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think deceit's going to work on this one, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not being deceitful at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't even know what you're joining, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if they're doing evil shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then I don't want to join them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well-- You join to see what happens and then at least we're there when shit goes awry, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Either we walk in and we get ambushed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An ambush means that they take you by surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've got the entire upper hand right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not really selling your point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How am I not? They've got--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would we fight that? You can't go up against the house when it's like that, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems like something that we should stop. It feels evil, but Vess DeRogna was no saint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever that they're doing that's evil, whatever ritual that they're trying to accomplish, they're not going to accomplish it tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beyond that, we don't know, other than we know that he's here gathering shit for some reason.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just talk to the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure he is. We still being watched?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm-- it's up, lasts for an hour, so I can look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no sign of anything around you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that this necessarily, this doesn't feel like an ambush because they wouldn't be setting us up for this and let us walk in, I guess?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he thinks he's here because we're competing against him, or he knows we have no clue what's going on and we're simply chasing him and he is leading us into a trap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also entirely possible that he doesn't know why we're chasing him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also may have a Locate Creature spell, so we can lock in on Cree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know what we're chasing right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have nothing that we can do to solve them, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go along for the ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How is that different from what we're about to do? We're going down there anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not going to-- It's the difference between saying, "Hey, what's up," and fighting them right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have to fight them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We either go down-- So that's the conversation, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We try and talk before anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think there's any question that we're going in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm debating what do we do when we find them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do our best to defend ourselves and have a conversation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just had dinner with fucking yetis for christ's sake. I'm fine listening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to watch us as we go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the more amicable we've seen, it means we are not resurrecting someone tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll see how it goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to go in at a disadvantage to find out--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a difference between-- joining and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is semantics, Beauregard, we're going in! I'm not going to agree--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not debating that we're not going in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- to join the Eyes of Nine in advance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm only presenting a plan for when we encounter them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can get in the car with someone and see where they're headed without--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take it one step at a time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the road looks like it's opening up in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not opt-- don't mistake any of this for optimism like I have hope

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll start walking towards the entrance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't want anything to be misconstrued that I am joining in some sort of evil force, but fighting it head on doesn't seem like the point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We get it. We get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Caleb enter the cavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we sending Frumpkin ahead? Are we doing anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think that's actually fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like me and Yasha are standing outside of the cave for a minute.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, they could've killed us, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, they didn't come after us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not that that means much, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't really have a choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place my hand on Fjord's shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up there next week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what to think about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and we'll pick up there as you delve into your first excavation, outer excavation of Aeor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's little bobas all over the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He broke a pencil with one hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so proud of you, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grenade went off right in my lap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good metaphor for germ spread.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget, we love you guys very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
